entry.content: Posted by Zizhao Zhang, Software Engineer, Google Research, Cloud AI Team In visual understanding, the Vision Transformer (ViT) and its variants have received significant attention recently due to their superior performance on many core visual applications, such as image classification, object detection, and video understanding. entry.title: Building a Visual Search Engine ‚Äì Part 1: Data Exploration | KDnuggets
entry.summary: Ever wonder how Google or Bing finds similar images to your image? The algorithms for generating text based 10 blue-links are very different from finding visually similar or related images. In this ar...
entry.content: Ever wonder how Google or Bing finds similar images to your image? The algorithms for generating text based 10 blue-links are very different from finding visually similar or related images. In this article, we will explain one such method to build a visual search engine. We will use the Caltech 101 dataset which contains images of common objects used in daily life.
